example[0]: a smudge of lipstick on the cup
definition[1]: if ink, writing etc smudges, or if you smudge it, it becomes dirty and unclear because it has been touched or rubbed
example[1]: Don’t touch it! You’ll smudge the ink.
definition[2]: to make a dirty mark on a surface
example[2]: Someone had smudged the paper with their greasy hands.
